heroHook: "Why does this keep happening?" Valentina, a opera singer learning new roles, asked nobody in particular. She'd just opened a new ChatGPT chat and realized — again — that everything she'd taught the AI about libretto translations was gone. This article exists because "gpt 5 forgetting context coding" deserves a real answer, not the surface-level explanations you'll find elsewhere.
